body: I came here to read this manhwa because of an annoying advertisements about this manhwa that I have been getting everywhere on various websites which all came from chapter 2 pages. Couple of things that I learned is that her name is not Mrs. Cha, and this manhwa is not rated PG-13. @Owlduty420 I agree, he is is the most purest and most likeable main character that I have ever seen in adult manhwa.
He is too pure we must protect his chastity from this thot
